traits.name: Instinctive Reflexes
entries: The conduit has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't have disadvantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the conduit is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The conduit makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the conduit can choose one of the following additional effects (up to once per turn each):

items.name: Incapacitate
entries: The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of the conduit's next turn.

items.name: Push
entries: The target is pushed up to 10 feet horizontally away from the conduit.
